Special Powers
RETURN TO HOST BODY: FREE: If Negative Spirit wasn't generated this turn and is adjacent to Negative Man, remove Negative Spirit from the game.
ALIEN ENERGY BEING: Passenger: 0, Hypersonic Speed. When Negative Spirit uses Hypersonic Speed, after resolutions deal 1 damage to an opposing character he moved through during the action.
